Source code for juzzyPython.type1.system.T1_Consequent


"""
T1_Consequent.py
Created 18/12/2021
"""


from juzzyPython.generic.Output import Output
from juzzyPython.type1.sets.T1MF_Interface import T1MF_Interface


[docs]class T1_Consequent:
    """
    Class T1_Consequent: 
    Consequent for a fuzzy rule of a Type-1 Fuzzy System.

    Parameters:
        mF: The membership function defining the consequent
        output: The output of the consequent
        name: The name of the consequent
        
    Functions: 
        setMF
        getMF
        getOutput
        setOutput
        getName
        setName
        toString
      
    """

    def __init__(self,mF: T1MF_Interface,output: Output,name: str = None) -> None:
        if name != None:
            self.name = name
        else:
            self.name = mF.getName()
        self.mF = mF
        self.output = output


[docs]    def setMF(self,mF: T1MF_Interface) -> None:
        """Set the membership function for the consequent"""
        self.mF = mF

    

[docs]    def getMF(self) -> T1MF_Interface:
        """Get the membership function for the consequent"""
        return self.mF

    

[docs]    def getOutput(self) -> Output:
        """Get the output for the consequent"""
        return self.output

    

[docs]    def setOutput(self,out: Output) -> None:
        """Set the output for the consequent"""
        self.output = out

    

[docs]    def getName(self) -> str:
        """Get the name of the consequent"""
        return self.name

    

[docs]    def setName(self,name: str) -> None:
        """Set the name of the consequent"""
        self.name = name

    

[docs]    def toString(self) -> str:
        """Convert the consequent to a string"""
        return "Consequent with MF: "+ self.mF.toString()
